title: Fake Job Training Fees

steps.text: Congratulations! You've been selected for our remote customer service position at $25/hour. Before starting, you need to complete our mandatory training program. There's a one-time $150 training fee to cover materials and certification.

choices.label: Pay the training fee to secure the job
Legitimate jobs don't require upfront payments

steps.feedback: Real employers pay you for training - they never charge training fees.

debrief: AUTHORITY + FOOT-IN-DOOR: Employment scams use fake authority (HR department, official job offer) and start with small requests (training fee) to establish trust. Legitimate employers never charge fees for training, background checks, or equipment. They pay you, not the other way around.
